price: 53. Naharsi maraa kee wadirsi mari farmoyta dirabboysaanamal sitta maay farriimen inkih woh iyyen waqdi, aleey, wonna hinnay usun caddok tatre mara koroosannul.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
